channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: How to Create Custom Wake Word For Your Voice Assistant In Home Assistant
item.description: In this article, we will explore how we can create a custom wake word for our voice assistant to invoke Home Assistant
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: How to Easily Share Files With Home Assistant OS with Samba Share
item.description: In this article, we will explore how we can share files with Home Assistant OS
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
